Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Athletic Communications Posted/Updated: 10-05-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for the publicity and promotion of the Athletic Department, which includes 19 varsity sports with approximately 350 student-athletes participating, coaches and administrators.
